definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: "Notes taken in Rong Study", comments on and studies of the …
sentences.chinese: 《容齋隨筆》對《史記》人物的評論和研究。

sentences.english: That woman wrote essays for newspapers and online publications.
sentences.chinese: 這位女性寫了很多的報紙隨筆及網上作品。

sentences.english: Over three years he stayed in Gemany, he wrote a lot of essays and poems.
sentences.chinese: 在德國三年期間寫了大量的隨筆和詩歌。

sentences.english: In the nineties, I published many prose and jottings. In those days, my soul entangled itself.
sentences.chinese: 90年代發表了很多散文隨筆，是靈魂糾纏着靈魂。

sentences.english: The second is semantic research of psychological verb.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分是關於《容齋隨筆》心理動詞語義的研究。

sentences.english: "Notes taken in Rong Study", comments on and studies of the characters in the Records.
sentences.chinese: 《容齋隨筆》對《史記》人物的評論和研究。

sentences.english: Now, suppose you need to write articles and essays on some topics.
sentences.chinese: 現在假定你需要就某些主題寫幾篇文章或隨筆。

sentences.english: His essays can be Oxbridge musty.
sentences.chinese: 他的隨筆或許帶有陳腐的學究氣。

sentences.english: Today, has written four "mood Essay, " a good mood.
sentences.chinese: 今天，已經撰寫了四則“心情隨筆”，心情很好。

sentences.english: It’s possible that I seem to contradict myself in this essay.
sentences.chinese: 我在這篇隨筆中似乎自相矛盾，這是可能的。
馬策在一篇隨筆中寫到。

sentences.english: It shows fully that the study of the essay and Chinese modern essay is very difficult.
sentences.chinese: 這充分說明了，研究隨筆和中國現代隨筆的煩難。

sentences.english: It shows fully that the study of the essay and Chinese modern essay is very difficult.
sentences.chinese: 這充分說明了，研究隨筆和中國現代隨筆的煩難。

sentences.english: In addition to his novels, creative nonfiction short stories and essays.
sentences.chinese: 除了小說，他還創作散文，短劇和隨筆。

definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
